sentence.Network_en: Neighbours eventually levered open the door with a crowbar.
sentence.Network_cn: 邻居们最终用一根铁撬把门撬开了。

sentence.Network_en: I got him on the back of the head with a crowbar.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一撬棍打在他头的后部.

sentence.Network_en: One particular prisoner recalls having hidden a crowbar In the area concerned.
sentence.Network_cn: 有个囚犯在那个地方藏了个铁撬.

entry.def: A crowbar is a heavy iron bar which is used as a lever.

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy iron lever with one end forged into a wedge
